caption.title: Rabies transmission by host type.
caption.p: Probability densities for each k ij , or the expected number of secondary infections of type i that result from a single infection of type j. Domestic dogs are host type 1, and all other animals belong to host type 2. (a) k 11 , (b) k 21 , (c) k 12 , (d) k 22 .
